string.name: to_log_in
string.u: Already have an account? Login here

resources.string: Recipe Manager is the easy way to quickly and easily enter all your favorite recipes and organize them exactly the way you want! Quickly search for your favorite recipes by a simple search. For all you visual learners out there, all our recipes can be linked to a YouTube video or an official recipe website! Lastly, you have the ability to share all your favorite recipes with anyone you like. Never worry about the unorganized paper recipes laying around your kitchen again, as Recipe Manager provides all the necessary tools to excel in your kitchen!

string.name: to_sign_up
string.u: Dont have an account? Sign up here

resources.string: Welcome back to Recipe Manager! Please login below to continue using this app.
